conversations.content: Please reschedule my Dental check-up to 2024-05-20 at 10:00.

<function_thought>
To reschedule the dental check-up, I need to first search for calendar events for the dental appointment to find its event ID. Once I have the event ID, I can proceed to reschedule it to the specified date and time. Therefore, I will start by searching for calendar events that match the query "Dental check-up".
</function_thought>

<function_call>[search_calendar_events(query="Dental check-up")]</function_call>

</function_thought>

<function_call>[reschedule_calendar_event(event_id="5", new_start_time="2024-05-20 10:00", new_end_time="2024-05-20 11:00")]</function_call>
